definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Of all the economically important plants，palms have been the least studied.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的經濟作物中，棕櫚樹得到的研究最少。

sentences.english: The European corn borer is a common pest in this economically valuable crop.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲玉米螟是一種經濟作物玉米上的常見害蟲。

sentences.english: This singular discovery led to an explosion of success as the plant became the colony's major cash crop.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現使得菸草成爲這片殖民點上的主要經濟作物。

sentences.english: The vanilla is a strategic product for Malagasy economy.
sentences.chinese: 香草是馬達加斯加人的一種戰略經濟作物。

sentences.english: The farmers will grow more cash crops next year instead of grains.
sentences.chinese: 明年農民將種植更多的經濟作物取代糧食作物。

sentences.english: How can women farmers benefit from planting cash crops?
sentences.chinese: 農民婦女怎樣才能從種植經濟作物中獲得收益？

sentences.english: Detoxification potato is a major cash crop planted in the south of Liaoning.
sentences.chinese: 脫毒馬鈴薯是遼南地區種植較多的經濟作物。

sentences.english: What are the main gain crops and industrial crops in Hei longjiang ?
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江省主要的糧食作物和經濟作物有哪些？

sentences.english: Peanut (Arachis hypogaea L. ) is one of the important oil and economic crops.
sentences.chinese: 花生是全球性的重要油料作物和經濟作物。

definition: test planting/crop grown on a trial basis
(agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
